mapper.insert: insert into app_Recomment(rcom_no, com_no, d_no, rcom_cont) values(#{recNo},#{comNo}, #{docNo}, #{recContent})
mapper.select: select c.com_no, m.m_no as d_no, m.m_name as doctorName, cat.cat_no, c.com_tile, c.com_date, c.com_view, c.filter, c.com_cont, c.com_area from app_Recomment r join app_category cat on c.cat_no = cat.cat_no join app_member m on c.d_no = m.m_no order by com_no desc
